languages.text: Всему Простору было известно о страсти, что связала Джай и Вольного Торговца. Не раз и не два контрабандистка отправлялась в опасные приключения со сво{mf|им|ей} Лорд-капитаном, и страсть между ними полыхала столь же жарко, как и в первый день их знакомства. Но стоило походу завершиться, как Джай исчезала, порой — без предупреждения. Сколь ни была приятна компания Вольного Торговца владычице контрабандистов, она никогда не позволяла их отношениям перейти черту, за которой начинается нечто большее, чем симпатия. Владеть Джай Хейдари могла лишь сама Джай Хейдари.

The entire Expanse knew of the bond between Jae and the Rogue Trader. The smuggler accompanied her Lord Captain on many dangerous adventures, and their passion for each other burned as fiercely as on the first day they met. Yet as soon as a journey ended, Jae would disappear, sometimes without any notice. No matter how much she enjoyed the Rogue Trader's company, the accomplished smuggler never allowed their relationship to turn into something more. The only master Jae Heydari would ever need was Jae Heydari.
languages.original_text: Всему Простору было известно о страсти, что связала Джай и Вольного Торговца. Не раз и не два контрабандистка отправлялась в опасные приключения со сво{mf|им|ей} Лорд-капитаном, и страсть между ними полыхала столь же жарко, как и в первый день их знакомства. Но стоило походу завершиться, как Джай исчезала, порой — без предупреждения. Сколь ни была приятна компания Вольного Торговца владычице контрабандистов, она никогда не позволяла их отношениям перейти черту, за которой начинается нечто большее, чем симпатия. Владеть Джай Хейдари могла лишь сама Джай Хейдари.

traits.locale_text: The entire Expanse knew about the passion that burned between Jae and the Rogue Trader. Many a time she ventured on dangerous adventures with her Lord Captain, and their affection for each other burned as fiercely as on the first day. Yet as soon as their journey ended, Jae disappeared, sometimes without any notice. No matter how much she enjoyed the Rogue Trader's company, the mistress of the smugglers never allowed their relationship to turn into something more than just affection. Jae Heydari was the only one who was allowed to be the master of Jae Heydari.

The entire Expanse knew about the passion that burned between Jae and the Rogue Trader. Many a time she ventured on dangerous adventures with her Lord Captain, and their affection for each other burned as fiercely as on the first day. Yet as soon as a journey ended, Jae would disappear, sometimes without any notice. No matter how much she enjoyed the Rogue Trader's company, the master contrabandist never allowed their relationship to turn into something more. The only master Jae Heydari would ever need was Jae Heydari.

The smuggler accompanied her Lord Captain on many dangerous adventures, and their passion for each other burned as fiercely as on the first day they met. Yet as soon as a journey ended, Jae would disappear, sometimes without any notice. languages.text: 整个科罗努斯扩区都知道婕伊与行商浪人之间的关系。这位走私者陪伴她的领主舰长进行过许多危险的冒险，他们对彼此的热情就像初见时一样熊熊燃烧。然而，每当旅行结束时，婕伊就会消失不见，有时甚至不会留下任何通知。无论她多么喜欢行商浪人的陪伴，这位事业有成的走私者都不打算让他们的关系更进一步。婕伊·海达利唯一侍奉的主人只有她自己。
languages.original_text: The entire Expanse knew of the bond between Jae and the Rogue Trader. The smuggler accompanied her Lord Captain on many dangerous adventures, and their passion for each other burned as fiercely as on the first day they met. Yet as soon as a journey ended, Jae would disappear, sometimes without any notice. No matter how much she enjoyed the Rogue Trader's company, the accomplished smuggler never allowed their relationship to turn into something more. The only master Jae Heydari would ever need was Jae Heydari.

traits.locale_text: 整个科罗努斯扩区都知道婕伊与行商浪人之间的关系。这位走私者陪伴她的领主舰长进行过许多危险的冒险，他们对彼此的热情就像初见时一样熊熊燃烧。然而，每当旅行结束时，婕伊就会消失不见，有时甚至不会留下任何通知。无论她多么喜欢行商浪人的陪伴，这位走私大师都不打算让他们的关系更进一步。婕伊·海达利唯一侍奉的主人只有她自己。

languages.text: Die gesamte Ausdehnung wusste von der Verbindung zwischen Jae und {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Die Schmugglerin begleitete ihren Lord Captain auf vielen gefährlichen Abenteuern, und ihre Leidenschaft füreinander brannte so heiß wie am ersten Tag. Doch sobald eine Reise beendet war, verschwand Jae, manchmal wortlos. So sehr sie die Gesellschaft {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auch genoss, die Meisterschmugglerin ließ nie zu, dass mehr aus ihrer Beziehung wurde. Der einzige Meister, den Jae Heydari jemals brauchen würde, war Jae Heydari.
languages.original_text: The entire Expanse knew of the bond between Jae and the Rogue Trader. The smuggler accompanied her Lord Captain on many dangerous adventures, and their passion for each other burned as fiercely as on the first day they met. Yet as soon as a journey ended, Jae would disappear, sometimes without any notice. No matter how much she enjoyed the Rogue Trader's company, the accomplished smuggler never allowed their relationship to turn into something more. The only master Jae Heydari would ever need was Jae Heydari.

traits.locale_text: Die gesamte Ausdehnung wusste von der Verbindung zwischen Jae und {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Die Schmugglerin begleitete ihren Lord Captain auf vielen gefährlichen Abenteuern, und ihre Leidenschaft füreinander brannte so heiß wie am ersten Tag. Doch sobald eine Reise beendet war, verschwand Jae, manchmal wortlos. So sehr sie die Gesellschaft {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auch genoss, die Königin des illegalen Warenhandels ließ nie zu, dass mehr aus ihrer Beziehung wurde. Der einzige Meister, den Jae Heydari jemals brauchen würde, war Jae Heydari.

languages.text: Le lien qui unissait Jae {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} était connu de tous dans les Étendues. Leur passion était aussi dévorante qu'au premier jour, et la contrebandière accompagnait souvent {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine} dans des aventures périlleuses. Cependant, aussitôt qu'un voyage prenait fin, Jae disparaissait, parfois sans crier gare. Malgré son attachement {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}, la contrebandière ne laissa jamais leur relation devenir plus sérieuse. Jae Heydari était sa seule maîtresse et le resterait pour toujours.
languages.original_text: The entire Expanse knew of the bond between Jae and the Rogue Trader. The smuggler accompanied her Lord Captain on many dangerous adventures, and their passion for each other burned as fiercely as on the first day they met. Yet as soon as a journey ended, Jae would disappear, sometimes without any notice. No matter how much she enjoyed the Rogue Trader's company, the accomplished smuggler never allowed their relationship to turn into something more. The only master Jae Heydari would ever need was Jae Heydari.

traits.locale_text: Le lien qui unissait Jae {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} était connu de tous dans les Étendues. Leur passion était aussi dévorante qu’au premier jour, et la contrebandière accompagnait souvent {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine} dans des aventures périlleuses. Cependant, aussitôt qu'un voyage prenait fin, Jae disparaissait, parfois sans crier gare. Malgré son attachement {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}, elle ne laissa jamais leur relation devenir plus sérieuse. Jae Heydari était sa seule maîtresse et le resterait pour toujours.

languages.text: Toda la Extensión conocía el vínculo entre Jae y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. La contrabandista acompañó a su Lord Capitán en muchas aventuras arriesgadas, y su pasión mutua ardía con tanta fuerza como el día en que se conocieron. Sin embargo, en cuanto terminaba uno de sus viajes, Jae desaparecía, en ocasiones sin avisar. Por más que disfrutara de la compañía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, la legendaria contrabandista nunca permitió que su relación se convirtiera en nada más. Jae Heydari solo obedecería a una persona: la misma Jae Heydari.
languages.original_text: The entire Expanse knew of the bond between Jae and the Rogue Trader. The smuggler accompanied her Lord Captain on many dangerous adventures, and their passion for each other burned as fiercely as on the first day they met. Yet as soon as a journey ended, Jae would disappear, sometimes without any notice. No matter how much she enjoyed the Rogue Trader's company, the accomplished smuggler never allowed their relationship to turn into something more. The only master Jae Heydari would ever need was Jae Heydari.

traits.locale_text: Toda la Extensión conocía el vínculo entre Jae y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. La contrabandista acompañó a su Lord Capitán en muchas aventuras arriesgadas, y su pasión mutua ardía con tanta fuerza como el día en que se conocieron. Sin embargo, en cuanto terminaba uno de sus viajes, Jae desaparecía, en ocasiones sin avisar. Por más que disfrutara de la compañía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, la maestra del contrabando nunca permitió que su relación se convirtiera en nada más. Jae Heydari solo obedecería a una persona: la misma Jae Heydari.

languages.text: ジェイと自由開拓者の絆は、エクスパンス全体に知れ渡っていた。密輸業者はロード・キャプテンの危険な冒険に同行し、二人の情熱は出会ったときと同様に激しく燃え上がった。しかし旅が終わるやいなや、ジェイは時折、何の連絡もなく姿を消すようになった。どんなに自由開拓者と一緒にいるのが楽しくても、熟練した密輸者は、二人の関係がそれ以上のものになることを許せなかった。ジェイ・ヘイダリが必要とする主人は、ジェイ・ヘイダリだけだったのだ。
languages.original_text: The entire Expanse knew of the bond between Jae and the Rogue Trader. The smuggler accompanied her Lord Captain on many dangerous adventures, and their passion for each other burned as fiercely as on the first day they met. Yet as soon as a journey ended, Jae would disappear, sometimes without any notice. No matter how much she enjoyed the Rogue Trader's company, the accomplished smuggler never allowed their relationship to turn into something more. The only master Jae Heydari would ever need was Jae Heydari.

traits.locale_text: ジェイと自由開拓者の絆は、エクスパンス全体に知れ渡っていた。密輸業者はロード・キャプテンの危険な冒険に同行し、二人の情熱は出会ったときと同様に激しく燃え上がった。しかし旅が終わるやいなや、ジェイは時折、何の連絡もなく姿を消すようになった。どんなに自由開拓者と一緒にいるのが楽しくても、熟練した密輸者は、二人の関係がそれ以上のものになることを許せなかった。ジェイ・ヘイダリが必要とする主人は、ジェイ・ヘイダリだけだったのだ。

languages.text: Jae ve Hür Tacir arasındaki bağı tüm Enginlik biliyordu. Lord Kaptan'a sayısız tehlikeli macerada eşlik eden kaçakçının duyduğu tutku, ilk günkü gibi ateşle yanmaya devam etti. Ancak her bir yolculuk sona erdiğinde Jae ortadan kayboluyor, bazen haber bile vermiyordu. Hür Tacir'in dostluğundan mutlu olsa da başarılı kaçakçı, aralarındaki ilişkinin daha büyük bir şeye dönüşmesine asla izin vermedi. Jae Heydari'nin tek bir sahibi olabilirdi, o da Jae Heydari'ydi.
languages.original_text: The entire Expanse knew of the bond between Jae and the Rogue Trader. The smuggler accompanied her Lord Captain on many dangerous adventures, and their passion for each other burned as fiercely as on the first day they met. Yet as soon as a journey ended, Jae would disappear, sometimes without any notice. No matter how much she enjoyed the Rogue Trader's company, the accomplished smuggler never allowed their relationship to turn into something more. The only master Jae Heydari would ever need was Jae Heydari.

traits.locale_text: Jae ve Hür Tacir arasındaki bağ tüm Enginlik tarafından biliniyordu. Kaçakçı, Lord Kaptan'a sayısız tehlikeli macerada eşlik etti ve tutkuları, ilk günkü gibi ateşli bir şekilde yanmaya devam etti. Ancak her bir yolculuk sona erdiğinde Jae ortadan kayboluyordu ve bazen haber bile vermiyordu. Hür Tacir'in dostluğundan mutlu olsa da başarılı kaçakçı, aralarındaki ilişkinin daha büyük bir şeye dönüşmesine asla izin vermedi. Jae Heydari'nin tek bir sahibi olabilirdi: Jae Heydari.
